article_title: Triangle hospitals, doctors on edge as new code system prepares to go live
article_text:
Switch to ICD-10 medical coding will introduce thousands of new codes

Hospitals, doctors are bracing for possible payment disruptions beginning Oct. 1

Blue Cross, NCTracks say they are ready to process medical claims

article_metadata.news-keywords: ICD-9, ICD-10, Medicare, Medicaid, Blue Cross, Blue Shield, Cash flow, Billing, Insurance, Triangle, WakeMed, Rex
article_metadata.description: The nation’s health care system makes its long-awaited switch to a new digital documentation system Oct. 1. Hospitals, and doctors anticipate problems.
article_metadata.title: Triangle hospitals, doctors on edge as new code system prepares to go live | News & Observer
